    Key Findings Summary

    What Agent-o-rama Is

    âœ… End-to-end LLM agent platform for Java/Clojure âœ… Built on Rama distributed computing âœ… Agents as directed graphs with integrated storage âœ… Native client libraries (not HTTP)

    What This Package Provides

    âœ… HTTP wrapper around native client âœ… RESTful JSON API endpoints âœ… Server-Sent Events streaming âœ… Training/inference/pattern endpoints âœ… Production deployment guides

    Whatâ€™s Not Available

    âŒ Built-in HTTP API in agent-o-rama âŒ gRPC support (requires custom implementation) âŒ WebSocket (SSE provided instead) âŒ GraphQL (REST only)

    Common Tasks

    Test Locally

    # Start service
lein repl
(require '[agents.agent-o-rama-http-client :as client])
(def server (client/start-http-service {:port 3000}))

# Test endpoint
curl http://localhost:3000/health

    Invoke Agent

    curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/agents/my.module/MyAgent/invoke \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"input": "test"}'

    Stream Output

    curl -N -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/agents/my.module/MyAgent/stream \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"input": "generate", "node": "process"}'

    Deploy with Docker

    docker build -t agent-http-client .
docker run -d -p 3000:3000 agent-http-client
